> ***I listed some old Japanese films I saw and their
> directors and
> momoiro insists that in Japan it is actually
> difficult to purchase old
> films and they aren't shown on TV as much
> (especially chambara which
> fell out of favor a couple of decades ago)....


That seems to be true, unfortunately. Except on few
channels (like Toei TV Channel, which has a section
exclusively on chambara movies), it's hard to see a
chambara movie. And somehow it's hard to find them
videos available. I remember that I had some hard time
till I found that Mifune Toshiro's movie on the
Shinsengumi.


> Serizawa, I'm sorry to hear about your teacher's

Oh, no, no, sorry for the confusion >_< My master has
passed a few years ago (three, to be more accurate),
it's nothing recent. I do apologise again for
